headline: BALZERS ROTARY VANE PUMP 21.2 CFM
description: Two Stage Mechanical Vacuum Pump      Pumping speed and ultimate pressure are based on 60 Hz operation.
keywords: mechanical vacuum pump backing pump roughing pump two stage pump
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Rotary Vane Pumps
specstable:
Manufacturer Balzers
Model DUO030A
Pumping Speed 21.2 CFM (599.1 l/m)
Ultimate Pressure 1.50E-3(En) torr (2.00E-3 mbar)
Inlet Flange KF 40.0 mm (1.575 in)
Exhaust Flange KF 40.0 mm (1.575 in)
Two-Stage YES
Motor Horsepower 1.5 HP
Rotational Speed 1,660 RPM
Other Information Pump mounted on casters
Catalog No. PKD24602C
Pump is not rebuilt
Power Requirements 3 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 9.500 in (24.1 cm)
Depth 23.000 in (58.4 cm)
Height 14.400 in (36.6 cm)
Weight 70 lb (32 kg)
